pages.title: Orbital Scan #0082
pages.text: $(bold)Subject: Best of Both Worlds$()$(br2)Orbital engineering had a thought: "What if the thing that stops frostbite goes $(italic)inside$() the thing that stops suffocation?"$(br2)They ran simulations for three days. The answer was yes.$(br2)The $(bold)Acheronite-Lined EVA Suit$() combines EVA atmospheric protection with Acheronite frostbite immunity. The best thing ORSA has ever designed. From orbit. Without testing it.$(br2)$(italic)"Better than the orbital stabilizer?" "The one that caused the apocalypse? Yes."$()

pages.title: Properties
pages.text: $(bold)Combines:$()$(br)$(li)EVA atmospheric protection$(li)Acheronite frostbite immunity$(li)Maximum cold resistance$(br2)Endgame gear. You've told the apocalypse to go away. It won't, but at least you'll be comfortable.$(br2)$(bold)Note:$() Only the chestplate can be lined. ORSA ran out of simulation time. And funding.

pages.title: Acheronite-Lined EVA Suit
pages.text: Surround an EVA chestplate with Refined Acheronite. The suit will resist. Push harder.
